title: Did Tommy Lahren say that Paden's supporters would lose and revolt if he lost the election?
subtitle: Another tweet did not advance well in the wake of January 6, 2021, the riot in the American Capitol.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Before the United States presidential election in 2020, the conservative character Tommy Lahern tweeted that supporters of Joe Biden would then "spoil and riot" if the former Vice-President lost.
